title: Unknown DirectX Error
body: I have an asus laptop model number Q553UB. Recently I have been having problems access the game after the client starts the game up. I keep on getting messages that says there was an error in DirectX and that I should check for updates on my video driver. I have checked for the any new updates on my system or video driver and there were none. I have also run the DirectX diagnostic, but it has not found any problems. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled league, but I have still have this problem.

replies.body: This could be a driver issue, but also a security setting preventing files or assets from being accessed.  Try out our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well to make sure access is being allowed.  Then grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to reinstall for a possible fix.  Let me know if that helps!
